summary: This is a video about creating seamless textures. I just figured this out the other day and thought some could benefit from it. Everything I use is free to use so there's no wondering if you need some fancy programs.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG=left]http://i62.tinypic.com/effjaa.jpg[/IMG]This is a video tutorial about creating seamless textures. I won't make a text document because I don't have the time, hence the video. If someone wants to, be my guest.[/center]I am not comfortable with speaking, I will state that clear. This is also my first time making a video so it may not be superb. I just know that there are a lot of talented modders out there but seams seem (no pun) to plague all. So I've constantly been searching for a way to get rid of them. Here's my way. Maybe there is a better one, I do not know. If there is please comment cause I cannot find another soul to tell me.

[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/63339-1-1425661738.png[/img][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/63339-2-1425661738.png[/img][img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/63339-1-1425662120.png[/img]

There's still the meshes. So if the meshes have seams.....This can't do diddly....
[s]I am also not a youtuber....It scares me :([/s] Let's try it out.....

[color=yellow]

FAQ[/color]
Q: Can you put this on youtube?
A: [s]No, too scared.[/s] Ok I did....

Q: Can I put this on youtube?
A: [s]No, too scared.[/s] No need to, I already did.

Q: Will your husband put this on youtube?
A:[s]..........maybe.......gah!!...[/s] I'm sure he would of if I didn't beat him to it...

Q: Does this work for Normal maps?
A: [s]I haven't tried it yet. I'll let ya know. In Theory, yes. Hasn't been tested.[/s]
Yes,  Yes it does. Just tried it out with my fur body textures for my MaTera V2.

Q: Are you part fox?
A: In spirit maybe?

Q: Will you make a Document tutorial?
A: If I have the time, feel like it, or the blue moon equinox hits for 2 nights in a row.

Q: Your other mods suck and you should be ashamed of this video!
A: The cave is to the left! Also, not a question.....

Q: Is that the new texture for the MaTera?
A:[img]http://i57.tinypic.com/2cxf7ty.jpg[/img]

Q: That wasn't an answer...
A:[img]http://i59.tinypic.com/15p4w7k.jpg[/img] That wasn't a question. EE HEE!

You can also view this under [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63339/?tab=7&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodvideo%2F%3Fvtype%3D0%26id%3D63339&pUp=1]Videos[/url] and on [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CwxnDHyVM6M]Youtube[/url].



Credits:
[url=http://www.blender.org/]Blender[/url]
[url=http://www.bandicam.com/]Bandicam[/url]
author: Charismoon
